title: Kim Kardashian Reveals She 'Got in Trouble' with Kanye West for Letting Daughter North Wear Makeup
text:
Kim Kardashian Reveals She 'Got in Trouble' with Kanye West for Letting Daughter North Wear Makeup

Looks like it’s no more makeup for North West!

On Thursday, Kim Kardashian West opened up about her 6-year-old daughter wearing beauty cosmetics and revealed that the youngster is no longer allowed to do so after her husband Kanye West got mad about it.

“I think he had it, he changed all the rules,” Kim, 38, told E! News during her KKW x WINNIE makeup collaboration dinner in New York City.

Fans of the Kardashian West family know that North is no stranger to makeup.

The 6-year-old has been featured on her mother’s social media accounts multiple times wearing lipstick or eyeshadow, and even wore a bold red lip to their annual Christmas Eve party last year.

View photos The Kardashian West family | Kim Kardashian West/Instagram More

“I’d let her wear — you know, she has a little red for Christmas — I’d let her wear a red lip, or I’d let her do one pop of something,” Kim explained to E! News. “I’d let her, if she’s wearing a black dress, a black lip.”

“So, I kind of got in trouble for that,” the mother of four continued of her husband’s reaction. “So, it’s now no more makeup.”

Though North may not be able to play around with makeup, her mom reassured that she’s “absolutely” allowed to “weigh in” on fashion choices.

View photos Kim Kardashian West and North | Michael Simon/startraksphoto.com More

RELATED: ‘Auntie Kylie’ Jenner Tries Out Her Lip Kits on North West

Prior to West stepping in, North had proven that she was quite the beauty icon in the making.

Last year, Kim shared a series of videos to her Instagram Stories featuring North with a face full of makeup, including light foundation on her nose, dark eye shadow, bronzer, and a gray lip.

The beauty mogul filmed her daughter using a brush and her hand to attempt to blend her look and captioned the clip “Contour Queen,” adding the crown emoji. Another clip shared by Kim showed North modeling a bright red lipstick.

Suspecting that she may have to fend off some mommy shamers, Kim also wrote over the video, “Relax Mom Shamers, It’s coming off in a few mins. I just needed a bribe to get out of the door … you feel me?!?!?!”

Two months later, Kim documented North and her niece Dream Kardashian working together to contour her face with the newest KKW Beauty “Glam Bible” makeup kit.
description: Kim Kardashian Says Kanye West Got Mad for Letting North Wear Makeup
